paragraph.paragraph: Cluster folders (../../../../../images/icons/cluster_folder.ico) are folders that represent a underlying physical folder on disk. Cluster folders are added to EiffelEnvision projects automatically by the cluster_enumeration.xmlAutomatic Enumeration of explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folders that include_subdirectories../../../configuring/project_configuration/item_configuration/clusters.xmlInclude Subdirectories (also known as recursive clusters.)

When the parenting explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder'scluster_library../../../configuring/project_configuration/item_configuration/clusters.xmlCluster Library is set to Yes cluster folders are shown using the ../../../../../images/icons/cluster_folder_library.ico.

Cluster folders do not have any configurable properties to directly manipulate compilation as explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folders do. Instead cluster folders inherit all of their configuration details from the parenting explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder. It may be necessary to add finer grained configuration to the cluster folder, so EiffelEnvision allows you to to "promote" a cluster folder to an explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folders. This will take the parenting explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder../../../configuring/project_configuration/item_configuration/clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder Properties and create a new explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder.

To promote a cluster folder, simply select the Convert to Cluster menu item from the cluster_folder_context_menu.xmlCluster Folder Context Menu. Note: Because of the explicit_clusters.xmlwhat_is_a_clustercluster mechanism, explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder must have explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder parents. This means the Convert to Cluster option will not be available from the cluster_folder_context_menu.xmlcontext menu.

In the same way cluster folders can be promoted, explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder may also be demoted back to a cluster folder. Note: In order for a demotion to take place the explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder'spath../../../configuring/project_configuration/item_configuration/clusters.xmlPath must be a first level child of the parenting explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder'spath../../../configuring/project_configuration/item_configuration/clusters.xmlPath.
To demote a explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder's select the Revert to Folder menu item from the explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder'scluster_context_menu.xmlcontext menu.

Cluster folders only permit the adding of new and existing items/file_items.xmlfile and items/eiffel_classes.xmlEiffel class file items to be added directly underneath them. New cluster_folders.xmlfolders can also be added and other files and Eiffel class files items added to them. Note: For all cluster folders under the ../../eiffel_libraries/eiffel_libraries.xmlEiffel Libraries Folder only Eiffel source files can been added underneath them. Attempting to add other types of file items will results in an error dialog. Folders and other explicit clusters folder can be added.
Explicit cluster folders have their own context menu. See cluster_folder_context_menu.xmlCluster Folder Context Menu for a detailed rundown of the items that are available.
